EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Registering With Practice Priviledges!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations! You’re on your way to practice growth
Welcome John Smith! We are delighted that you will be joining us to learn about PracticePrivileges. Below is important information regarding your upcoming event.
Date: March 24, 2014 Location: The Renaissance Denver. Room 5DD Address: 1234 Mountain Way, Denver, CO 80321 Time: 8:00 PM
A great meal and beverage will be served. We look forward to seeing you!
If you have any specific questions please call: 800-617-0705 © 2014 Copyright PracticePrivileges. All rights reserved.
